availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, liquor merchant and grocer. Liquor merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, from 1864 to 1865. Grocer in partnership with S.P. Cary in J.M. Davis & Company in Louisville in 1865.

ab.bibl:
"Wines," The Louisville Daily Journal (Louisville, KY), December 10, 1864, p.2.
"Nails," The Louisville Daily Journal (Louisville, KY), July 31, 1865, p. 3.
Edwards' Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business firms, Etc., Etc., in the City of Louisville, For 1865-6 (Louisville: Edwards, Greenough & Deved, 1866), 267.
